data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Kara wears makeup every day - whether she's going to work or to the grocery store. Her ____ taught ____ how ____ apply ____ when ____ was a little ____. Ever ____, ____ has ____ playing ____ different ____ and ____. She says that she doesn't feel like herself if she doesn't have a little makeup on!
data.partBlankContent: Kara wears makeup every day - whether she's going to work or to the grocery store. Her mot___ taught h__ how t_ apply i_ when s__ was a little gi__. Ever si___, s__ has be__ playing wi__ different col___ and techn_____. She says that she doesn't feel like herself if she doesn't have a little makeup on!
data.answer: 卡拉每天都化妆——无论是去上班还是去杂货店。当她还是个小女孩的时候，她的母亲教她如何化妆。从那以后，她一直在用不同的颜色和技巧化妆。她说如果不化点妆她就会觉得不舒服!
